Best platform to learn everything

School Education (K – 12)
Regular Course (School / Board Exam) For Class 8th, 9th & 10th
Foundation Course (Olympiad + Engineering / Medical Foundation) For Class 8th, 9th & 10th
Integrated Course (Board/School Exam + Engineering & Medical Entrance Exam) for Class 11th / PU 1 & 12th / PU2
International curriculum (IGCSE/ IB / AS & A Level)
Why EdUtopia?
  • Spectacular Results

    • The best way to get spectacular results is through continuous practice and hard work. We have given the great inputs to our students and are extremely proud of them for giving great outputs.

  • Materialized Resources

    • We provide our students a complete package of study materials which have proved to be of great help to boost their preparation and confidence to clear exams.

  • Excellent Faculty

    • We have a team of dedicated & qualified passionate teachers who provide their immense knowledge to students and help them to learn in detail about the subject which helps students to achieve the required outcomes for competitive exams.

  • Personalized attention & better Analytics

    • We give personalized attention to every students and we do a detailed analysis of strengths and weaknesses of our students, which in turn helps them to improve their knowledge and preparation for exams.

    • Regular Objective & Subjective Test
    • Feedback about Students Performance.
    • Students are given individual attention, their short comings are pointed and appropriate remedial action is advised
    • SME’s Lecture
    • Healthy Competitions among students of different Schools
    • Customized Learning based on students pace.
    • Mentoring & Career Counselling
    • Institute is managed by educationist, engineers and professional managers.
    • Audio-visual teaching aids.
    • Library for class IX, X, XI & XII students.
    • Even after completion of the course, students can use the facility of our doubt clearing session.
    • Disciplined environment.

Featured Teachers

Meet Our teachers

Our dedicated teachers are a major factor in the success of EduTopia. Teachers are drawn to the EduTopia family because of our robust model that emphasizes technology-based learning, and a supportive environment in which everyone is accountable for helping students reach the goal of acquiting knowledge and fairing well in their studies.
